text: Herbert Köfer (17 February 1921 - 24 July 2021) was a German actor and television presenter. He was born in Berlin. He starred in the 1963 movie Naked Among Wolves as Kluttig. He was also known for appearing in many comedy and crime movies through Polizeiruf 110.
